tool.name: batch
tool.description:
Execute multiple tool calls in a single request for optimal performance.
IMPORTANT RULES: - Maximum of 10 tool calls per batch - Cannot nest batch calls (no batch within batch) - Cannot call 'finish' tool within batch - Tools are executed serially to maintain order
Use batch when you need to: - Read multiple files at once - Perform several independent operations - Improve response time by reducing round trips

parameters.parameter:
Array of tool calls to execute. Each element must have: - tool: The name of the tool to execute (string) - parameters: Parameters for the tool (object)
Example: [ {"tool": "read", "parameters": {"file_path": "file1.py"}}, {"tool": "read", "parameters": {"file_path": "file2.py"}} ]

returns.field: Contains: total_calls, successful, failed, tools, details
